translations: n．一勺（量）：用勺子量出的一份量。
· Add two spoonfuls of sugar to the mixture.
在混合物中加入两勺糖。

sentences.sentence: She put two spoonfuls of sugar in her tea.
"Give him two spoonfuls of sulphur and a little molasses," said Mr. Zuckerman.
sentences.translation: “给它喂点两勺硫磺粉，再加点糖浆吧。”扎克曼先生说。

sentences.sentence: It can be store-bought plain yogurt or the last spoonfuls of your most recent homemade batch.
sentences.translation: 它可以使商店中没来的纯酸奶，或者是最后一勺你最近一批自制的酸奶。
